channel.title: Project RevolutionX (474/317)
channel.description:
Welcome To My Third Project. First I Will Start With Client Download Link,Then The Developers..
Client Download Link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?kwonntzghui]http://www.mediafire.com/?kwonntzghui[/url] (Current Version: 8.0)
[u]Server Developers[/u] -Revo (Me) (PurpleOwnzx@hotmail.com)
[u]Client Developers[/u] -SilentCJ (SilentCJ@hotmail.co.uk)
Now the working features
Godsword specials + stances -Walking -Talking -Clan Chat -Running -Castle Wars Now the non working features... ugh.. -Veng -Duel Arena -Login Glitch (Click Twice It Says No Response) -Items on death -Dds Special -Zgs Special Doesnt Freeze -NPCs Dont Freeze after Ice Spells -Agressive NPCs
P.S. This List Will Be Updated Daily/Weekly.
Question: What Do We Need? Answer:Well,We Need Server Developers And Client Developers Fixing Stuff Everyday.
Pictures Bandos GS Special GFX [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/5djknd.gif[/img] Armadyl GS Special GFX [img]http://i32.tinypic.com/ra5mjq.gif[/img] Player Shows On Equipment Status [img]http://i30.tinypic.com/w6xd7o.gif[/img]
